title: Taric Skin Bug
body: Emerald Taric, when stun is used, all those effected turn black and they twitch, almost like they're glitching out in game. This happens on  Champions and minions.

replies.body:
Hey allykin130 -

Thanks for the report!  Is [this what you're seeing](https://youtu.be/wOyeQTeLT1M?t=1m27s)? If so, this is working as intended. ^-^ If not, could you please shoot me a message/image with what you're seeing? Thanks! :D
